content.prompt: Which of the following is true based on the data in the line graph?

choices.label: The number of bills passed by Congress decreased under G. H. W. Bush.
The number of bills passed by Congress gradually increased under Nixon.
The number of presidential vetoes under Johnson decreased over time.
The number of presidential vetoes under Eisenhower increased over time.

topic.text: 2.4: Roles and Powers of the President

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
